DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : INTERLINK TO PRODUCE ' MOUSE ' DEVICES FOR IBM
DOC.TEXT: Interlink Electronics , a Camarillo-based producer of computer pointing_systems , said it has signed a contract with IBM to produce hand-held " mice " that will be incorporated into two new_lines of IBM ' s portable_computers , the 360 and 755 series ThinkPad Traveling Multimedia models . The company declined to give the dollar value of the agreement , which is for the life of the products . Interlink ' s mouse , called ProPoint , is a hand-held device that allows the user to control the cursor on a computer_screen even when standing a distance away .
